message: Accept this and we can call it a day!
You're going to regret this, Alice!
You think I'm going to regret this? I'm not afraid of a little competition!
You're pushing your luck, Bob! Don't overplay your hand!
You're not getting any more generous, are you?
You think I'm stuck in a rut? Think again, Bob!
Time to get serious, Bob. Meet me in the middle!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not backing down.
Desperate? You have no idea what desperation is, Bob!
It's time to think about the bigger picture, Bob. Let's split it down the middle!
You're still not getting it, Alice. I'm not budging.
You're not budging? Fine, I'll show you what it means to be stubborn!
It's time to call a truce, Bob. Let's split it down the middle and end this!
